unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Describing access entries in EKS could be used to enumerate valid cloud accounts and their associated access permissions, aiding attackers in identifying and leveraging existing credentials.
This technique involves discovering services running in the cloud environment. The DescribeAccessEntry API call can help attackers learn about access permissions and configurations of EKS
Access information can aid in developing tailored malware that exploits specific permissions or configurations discovered within EKS.

securityImplications: Attackers might use DescribeAccessEntry for reconnaissance, gathering detailed information about access configurations within AWS EKS.
